answers.answer: You can always ask. I did but my dr won't induce until 41 weeks
I am & I also have gestational diabetes and I was told not suppose to go over my due date but idk
Most doctors won't induce unless it's medically necessary.
In you have gestational diabetes they usually induce you at 39 week
Yes you can ask. I was induced earlier than 39 weeks. My dr was understanding of my situation and reason why.

question: Can I request to be induced I'm 39 weeks I have not dilated past 1cm according to my doctor n I'm always in so much pain ?
title: can i ?
